verses.verse: Now <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H9132>lived<s%> <S%H1961><s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and twenty-seven <S%H8141>years;<s%> [these were] the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H9132>life<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah.<s%>

And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in Kiriath-arba (that is, <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>) in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> for <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> and to <S%H1058>weep<s%> for her.
Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4191>dead,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> and a <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> you; <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H272>site<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> you, that I may <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight.<s%>"
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to him,

<S%H8085>"Hear<s%> us, my <S%H113>lord,<s%> you are a <S%H430>mighty<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> us; <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead<s%> in the <S%H4005>choicest<s%> of our <S%H6913>graves;<s%> <S%H376>none<s%> <S%H3808><s%> of us will <S%H3607>refuse<s%> you his <S%H6913>grave<s%> for <S%H6912>burying<s%> your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"
So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> it is your <S%H5315>wish<s%> [for me] to <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> out of my <S%H6440>sight,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> me, and <S%H6293>approach<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6714>Zohar<s%> for me,

that he may <S%H5414>give<s%> me the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he owns, <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of his <S%H7704>field;<s%> for the <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H3701>price<s%> let him <S%H5414>give<s%> it to me in your <S%H8432>presence<s%> for a <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H272>site.<s%> "

Now <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> was <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth;<s%> and <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth;<s%> [even] of <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H935>went<s%> in at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3808>"No,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> me; I <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and I <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in it. In the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> I <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you; <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> you will <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H3863>please<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me; I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3701>price<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3947>accept<s%> [it] from me, that I may <S%H6912>bury<s%> my <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>"
Then <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying<s%> to him,

"My <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me; a piece of <S%H776>land<s%> worth <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is that <S%H996>between<s%> me and you? So <S%H6912>bury<s%> your <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron;<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%> out for <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>named<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H5503>commercial<s%> <S%H5674>standard.<s%>

So Ephron's <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6440>faced<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> and <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that were within <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5439>confines<s%> of its <S%H1366>border,<s%> were <S%H6965>deeded<s%> <S%H6965>over<s%>

to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H4736>possession<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H935>went<s%> in at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> at <S%H4375>Machpelah<s%> <S%H6440>facing<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre<s%> (that is, <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>) in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

So the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> that is in it, were <S%H6965>deeded<s%> <S%H6965>over<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> for a <S%H6913>burial<s%> <S%H272>site<s%> by the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth.<s%>
